Text: RE A personal favorvery much I am attaching his resume for your review Original Message From mailto Sent Monday May PM To Cc Subject Re A personal favor Anurag I shall talk about Vikas to our IT people Can you send me his resume Vince Saksena Anurag on AM To cc Subject A personal favor Vince I have left a voice mail to you and will wait to talk to you personally My brother Vikas who is now in London is trying to make a switch from consulting world to working for a specific firm Over last few months I have heard of great deal about the success of Enron on line business which fits well in the area of his expertise I am wondering if you know of some one in London who he can speak to regarding career opportunities Since I spoke to you last a number of things have changed Recently my manadate was broaden to include leading a charge for developing a risk management function for both the domestic and international businesses for GMAC Needless to say this is exciting albeit making the life a little more hectic than usual Talk to you later Anurag Resdoc

Follow upI wanted to follow up with you concerning our earlier exchange regarding my brother Vikas Saksena Have you had a chance to speak to your IT folks I will be meeting with Vikas in London by the end of this month and will get a chance to talk to him in more detail May I ask him to call you directly For your reference his phone number in London is Thanks Anurag work home

RE Follow upVince Looks like we will both be in London at the end of Month I will be there on th and part of th Anurag Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday June AM To Cc Subject RE Follow up Anurag I forwarded the resume to London but I have not heard from them I shall be in London late in June and I shall bring it up in person with the IT people Vince Original Message From Saksena Anurag ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESSaksenaCAnuragCanuragEsaksenagmacrfcEcomE NRONcom Sent Tuesday June PM To Kaminski Vince J Subject Follow up Vince I wanted to follow up with you concerning our earlier exchange regarding my brother Vikas Saksena Have you had a chance to speak to your IT folks I will be meeting with Vikas in London by the end of this month and will get a chance to talk to him in more detail May I ask him to call you directly For your reference his phone number in London is Thanks Anurag work home
